name: Dojo Duels Green
description: Makes site theme into Dojo Mountain Dewl. Background is seamless Duel map. A lot less subtle than the previous theme. This also includes the code from Dojo Showcase Fix (unedited) written by m_x which was shared by license CC BY 4.0
additional_info:
Version 2 - Green only
Making this theme an option for the previous theme was a hassle so I made a new style.
Contact me at heartofthestorm.hyunsdojo.com if you'd like more colours or modifications.
Code is by me and is public domain, except the part written by m_x which is CC BY 4.0
Japanese gate image is by me and public domain, the dojo map belongs to Hyun and has unknown usage rights.
